# Jewelry AI - AI-Powered Jewelry Photography & Video Studio

## Provider Information
- Name: Jewelry AI
- Website: https://jewelryai.app
- Description: Transform jewelry photos into stunning professional shots with AI
- Industry: AI Photography, Jewelry Marketing, E-commerce Solutions

## About Us
Jewelry AI is a cutting-edge AI-powered photography and video studio specializing in jewelry product photography. We transform basic jewelry photos into hyper-realistic, professional on-model photography and videos.

### Key Services
- AI Jewelry Photography: Turn simple product shots into stunning on-model photography
- Video Production: Create professional jewelry videos with AI models
- 90% Cost Reduction: Dramatically cheaper than traditional photography studios
- 24-Hour Turnaround: Get 10 images and 3 videos in just one day
- Hyper-Realistic Results: AI-generated models wearing your jewelry pieces

## Pricing
We offer simple, transparent pricing packages:
- Starter Package: $99 - 10 professional AI photos + 3 short videos
- Business Package: $199 - 30 photos + 10 videos + priority delivery
- Enterprise: Custom solutions for jewelry brands and retailers

## Technology
- Framework: Next.js 16 with Static Site Generation
- AI Models: Advanced jewelry-specific image generation
- Output Formats: High-resolution AVIF, WebP, and PNG images
- Performance: 9.5/10 SEO score, optimized Core Web Vitals

## Portfolio
Visit our gallery at https://jewelryai.app/gallery to see:
- 135+ jewelry photography examples
- 39+ video examples
- Before/after transformations
- Real customer results

## Use Cases
1. E-commerce jewelry stores needing professional product photography
2. Jewelry brands launching new collections
3. Independent jewelry designers on limited budgets
4. Marketing agencies managing jewelry clients
5. Social media content creation for jewelry brands

## Customer Benefits
- Save 90% compared to traditional photography ($1000+ studio shoots)
- Get consistent, professional results every time
- Scale your content creation without hiring models or photographers
- 24-hour turnaround for urgent campaigns
- Perfect for Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, e-commerce sites
